Reviews.Title: generic packaging
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: This is an addendum to my seller's feedback. Though poorly packaged, the item is new [I think...], except for the battery and a tiny piece of rubber that's supposed to be covering a screw for vanity reason. The battery was in the box with the rest of the stuff unprotected/unwrapped with minor stains/dents. The original packaging from sony ericsson is very generic. There is no model number/serial with photos on box as you would expect if purchased from a sony store. The owner's manual is a generic one, not printed for any particular models. Inside, the phone/accessories [ie; battery, charger, lid] were tossed together like a salad, nothing was securely in their proper slot. I am not sure if that's how it came in from the manufacturer [sony ericsson] to the wholesaler, but this purchase could easily be mistaken for being used or refurbished. Fact, I check my purchase details several times upon receiving the package just to make sure I purchased a 'NEW' item vs used or refurbished. Nothing personal, but I'd think twice about this company before purchasing from them again. As for now, I am content with the item 'cause it works. Im keeping my fingers crossed hoping that it will hold up like a sony ericsson and not breakdown on me because it was mishandled by a third party, or it was used/refurbished and listed as new. For what it's worth, thank you UnlockedCellPhoneKings. You have made quite an impression on me.

Reviews.Title: no warrenty info or manuel
Reviews.Author: kf
Reviews.Content: the phone seems to work fine, just added sim card and it works just fine. my complant is that it looks to be refurbished and did not come with a owners manuel or instructions for the warrenty and it took two weeks to arrive.

Reviews.Title: How different!
Reviews.Author: Inna Andreva-miller
Reviews.Content: Initially, I was attracted to this phone by its look and the demo. However, this phone is slow to respond to prompts, links, and is pressure resistant per se. I stopped liking it from the first day I bought it in 2009. Today I replaced it with Samsung but their internal memories and capabilites are not comparable, and, unfortunately, Sony Ericsson TM506 is a better looking one!

Reviews.Title: Slow and unstable
Reviews.Author: GaseousSnake
Reviews.Content: This phone not only takes several seconds to respond to button presses after opening it, but it is also prone to shutting itself down randomly. Avoid this death trap!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Kamran Siddiqi
Reviews.Content: This is the best flip phone available it functions exactly like a semi smartphone. Great phone to purchase. You should buy this phone. It is perfect for someone who wants a cheap phone but with great features.

Reviews.Title: True world phone, but
Reviews.Author: C. Dowson "not a product of her environment"
Reviews.Content: First phone I've ever had break, at it's hinge. After... maybe 2 years. It has a great camera, which takes much better pics (in all kinds of light) than any iphones I've used, but with the unreinforced plastic at a place that gets the most use? Like much of Sony's design, it looks good, but doesn't cut it. I can still take pics of course, and make calls, but the phone flips like a broken cat tail. So. Not terribly useful. The plastic just gave way one day & was half off the next, and there's nothing to it. Since this is the only part of the phone that moves, it's a real bad call on Sony's part. Boo.Also it is as slow as everyone says it is, and you have to go through at least 3 steps to delete things. It's tedious. But I loved having a phone that really does travel and takes great pics. It's great for that.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: juan carlos granadillo
Reviews.Content: well almost all good sizes as some of you forgot to inform buyers Deveria be sincere because the battery was good for nothing, and other details but good thanks
